# Jodie Plant Marketing

> AI-powered digital marketing for startups and tech companies. One senior marketer. Your entire account.

## About

Jodie Plant Marketing is a solo digital marketing practice serving startups and tech companies. Jodie Plant brings 15+ years of experience in digital marketing, managing $5M+ in ad spend across 200+ campaigns. The practice uses AI-enhanced workflows to deliver senior-level marketing strategy and execution without agency bloat.

## Services

Core services include Search & AI Visibility (SEO + GEO), AI Marketing Systems, Authority Content & AI Citation, Smart-Stack Paid Media, Fractional Marketing Leadership, Social Media & Short-Form Video, Conversion Rate Optimization, Local Visibility & Reputation, and Email Marketing & Owned Audience.

## Engagement Models

- Foundation (from $1,500/mo): For seed to Series A startups building their marketing engine
- Growth (from $2,500/mo): For Series A-B companies ready to scale pipeline and visibility
- Authority / Fractional CMO (from $4,500/mo): Full marketing leadership without the full-time hire
- One-time projects: GTM Strategy Sprint ($3,000-$7,000), AI Visibility Audit ($500-$1,500)

## Pages

- [Homepage](https://www.jodieplant.com/): Marketing that gets you found — search visibility, AI citation, authority content, and smart paid media for startups and tech companies.
- [Services](https://www.jodieplant.com/services): AI-enhanced marketing services with The Visibility Engine framework, 9 service areas, and tiered pricing packages.
- [Results](https://www.jodieplant.com/results): Real credentials, methodology walkthroughs, and what to expect from an engagement. No fake case studies.
- [About](https://www.jodieplant.com/about): Jodie Plant's background, approach (4-step process), and how AI enhances marketing delivery.
- [Contact](https://www.jodieplant.com/contact): Get a free visibility snapshot — personalised video walkthrough with search analysis, AI citation check, and prioritised next actions.
- [Privacy](https://www.jodieplant.com/privacy): Privacy policy covering analytics, cookies, and data rights.
